trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around June 9th 2012
divs: sighting detailsaround 8pm on 6\9\12 i noticed a hovering glowing light on the horizon towards the southwest. i thought it was venus, but it was too bright, so i watched it. when it began to move i started filming it with iphone. when it moved out of sight i ran to my car and drove to a clearing. within the two minutes it took me to drive to a clearing it was gone. i drove around the area, but saw zero indication of object. there were no flashing lights on object. just a solid yellow orange glow. the sun was setting so it could have been reflecting off (maybe?) a metallic surface.
Summary: Glowing Hovering Object suddenly moves north and disappears
